name: Bits_n_bobs1.exe
description:
Press Q to access the pause menu inside of a minigame to see additional controls.

Bits_n_bobs1.exe is my first collection of minigames made quickly. I've been making them to get used to the basics of Godot 3.4. 

Though I will likely be leaving each individual game in its released state (excluding severe bug fixes), suggestions for improvement are always welcome and will be considered when I make future projects.

I'm still new to this kind of game development, and I deeply appreciate the advice of people more experienced than I am.

Thank you for viewing!
